title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
EB: Code assist should respect the platform line ends and use CRLF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the code editor on a Windows machine. 
2. Use the code assist feature to create a for loop with a temporary variable. 
3. Check the resulting code to see if it has LF linefeeds instead of the expected CRLF linefeeds.
